mapper.insert: insert into act_task (task_id, student_send_id, student_realize_id, `status`, task_describe, fee, address_id, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark, task_title, user_check_id, check_content, del_flag) values (#{taskId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{studentSendId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{studentRealizeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{taskDescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fee,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{addressId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userCheckId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{checkContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR})
mapper.select: select task_id, student_send_id, student_realize_id, `status`, task_describe, fee,pay_time, delivery_time, finish_time, address_id, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark, task_title, user_check_id, check_content, del_flag,cancel_time from act_task where task_id = #{taskId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select task_id, student_send_id, student_realize_id, `status`, task_describe, fee,pay_time, print_time, delivery_time, finish_time, address_id, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark, task_title, user_check_id, check_content, del_flag,cancel_time from act_task where student_send_id = #{studentSendId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and del_flag=#{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}

select task_id, student_send_id, student_realize_id, `status`, task_describe, fee,pay_time, print_time, delivery_time, finish_time, address_id, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark, task_title, user_check_id, check_content, del_flag,cancel_time from act_task where student_realize_id = #{studentRealizeId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and del_flag=#{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}

select task_id, student_send_id, student_realize_id, `status`, task_describe, fee,pay_time, print_time, delivery_time, finish_time, address_id, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark, task_title, user_check_id, check_content, del_flag,cancel_time from act_task where student_send_id = #{studentSendId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and del_flag=#{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR} and status =#{status,jdbcType=CHAR}

select task_id, student_send_id, student_realize_id, `status`, task_describe, fee,pay_time, print_time, delivery_time, finish_time, address_id, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark, task_title, user_check_id, check_content, del_flag from act_task where student_realize_id = #{studentRealizeId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and del_flag=#{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR} and status =#{status,jdbcType=CHAR}

select task_id, student_send_id, student_realize_id, `status`, task_describe, fee, pay_time, print_time, delivery_time, finish_time, address_id, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark, task_title, user_check_id, check_content, del_flag from act_task
